35 #ifndef ROS_TF_H_
36 #define ROS_TF_H_
37 
38 #include "geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h"
39 
40 namespace tf
41 {
42 
43 static inline geometry_msgs::Quaternion createQuaternionFromYaw(double yaw)
44 {
45  geometry_msgs::Quaternion q;
46  q.x = 0;
47  q.y = 0;
48  q.z = sin(yaw * 0.5);
49  q.w = cos(yaw * 0.5);
50  return q;
51 }
52 
53 }
54 
55 #endif
56 
tf::createQuaternionFromYaw
